message: Let's split fairly, I'll take a bit more
Let's be fair, I'll take a slightly larger share this time.  It's only a little more!
I'll take a bit less, but still more than half, consider the inflation!
I'm willing to give you a little more than last time, but I need a bigger share to make it worth my while. Let's make a deal!
Come on, meet me halfway, inflation is killing me!
This is my final offer.  I'm taking a bigger share this time because the money is losing value quickly.  If you don't accept, we'll both lose even more.
